Text.Page:
This task is simple, but not easy.

Take a team and penetrate deep into the Enlightened Union territory. Past the Tor Encroachment, you'll find a hazard zone full of giant beasts. The bookish union can't deal with them. If you kill one of each, they'll understand how much stronger we are.

Successful? Of course you were.

Good to see the Iron Order full of s like you.

Now about that reward.
